page.title: 20WILLOUGHBY-ON THE WOLDS IS:
page.content: A beutifully quiet village A farming village Full of wild animals A place with horses,rabbits and cattle A small Primary School a shop and an antique shop A place you can go either walking or riding A bowls club and a keep fit class Great for a sight-seeing area A lot of fun with a lot of dens A well-set-out village with a back lane where all the heavy lorries go down A smelly village when all the farmers spray their crops A church and a chapel Lots of old houses with white plaster interspersed with modern houses with red brick I love Willoughby!
